prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a young intelligent woman, realistic proportions, confident expression, turquoise-blue hair, yellow shorts, red tube top, high-tech lab background
feature_prompt: detailed skin pores, natural wide jawline, sharp eyes, defined cheekbones, smooth straight hair
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, illustration, CGI, cosplay, plastic skin, over-smooth face, curly or wavy hair, frizzy hair, small chin, exaggerated eyes, bad anatomy, flat lighting, low quality
